Review.Titre: Schemers
Review.Contenu: I'm in the same boat as some of the guys above - I ordered a new display screen for an iPhone 13, the display screen came with a broken ribbon cable although my package was also not very well packaged. When I realized the ribbon cable was broken, I immediately submitted an exchange request. I received a response next day requesting photos of the screen. After submitting the photos of the screen, I heard no response. I submitted multiple emails and called their "Customer service" number dozens and I mean dozens of times.. No answer, no call back after voicemail.A week later, I receive an email telling me I broke the ribbon cable and that's not covered under warranty. These guys are trash.

Review.Titre: Repair iPhone 12 mini screen is very poor
Review.Contenu: Repair iPhone 12 mini screen is very poor. Colors are off (especially blue hues) and after a few days will periodically not register screen touches. Connectors have been inspected under a microscope and show no damage. Parts are also not Apple genuine and will show alert message until an OEM screen can be installed. Battery appears to hold a decent charge after a week of use. Battery also shows an alert message until an OEM battery can be installed.

Review.Titre: Overnight shipping is a waste. Sent me a broken screen and don’t want to refund it
Review.Contenu: Sent me a broken screen and don’t want to refund it. Paid $30 for overnight shipping and it comes in a flimsy package, no bubble wrap, no wrapping, no protection at all! I Spent over $100 for a screen just for it to come like that. I will never use this company ever again. On top of that, they tell me i attempted an install When i literally took it out the package. Please be aware. Very shady company

Review.Titre: Have been buying from RepairPartsUSA…
Review.Contenu: Have been buying from RepairPartsUSA for years and have been happy with their products and customer service. However, recently I purchased an iPhone 13 screen for a personal replacement and the quality was very subpar. Moreover, when I attempted to return the screen they told me that the screen I sent back was not one of their screens due to it missing their manufacturing stamp. I emailed back and forth for several days trying to troubleshoot and eventually, they simply stopped replying. After spending $80+ on a screen and the $10 cost of return I am very frustrated to be holding the bill due to their inventory management issues. I am quite certain the screen I sent back was the one they sent me, I have no other iPhone 13 screens anywhere except the OEM one in my phone.

Review.Titre: I purchased an iPhone 13 Premium Hard…
Review.Contenu: I purchased an iPhone 13 Premium Hard OLED and Glass Screen Replacement and within 10 days the screen quit working.  It wasn't dropped or damaged in anyway, it just went completely dark.  The company initially said that they would replace it, however, while removing the screen, the plastic support plate separated from the glass, causing small spider cracks in the glass.  Again, this was secondary, as I was just removing the faulty to return it.  The ribbon cable was still intact, which could be used for testing to prove that it was a bad screen.  However, the company said that they would no longer warranty the screen because of the damage (done after the screen was already bad).  There are many other companies that offer the same product for much less and are way more reasonable to deal with!

Review.Titre: Bent Battery
Review.Contenu: Ordered iPod Mini 4 Premium battery as they call it for $19.99 plus $4.99 shipping! Item arrived in a thin padded envelope not sufficient to support a rigid Lithium battery! upon inspection I realized that battery was bent!! I called them up but nobody answered so I sent an email, their respond was to send the battery back and they will send another one! Now a responsible company would have provided a free return shipping label so customer don't have to pay for shipping!! after all it was their own damn fault not securing the package properly. Never going to order from them anymore.

I did not agree, and don’t think anyone should be shielded from the truth.  I never received a tool kit from them to resolve the issue because of this.

Review.Contenu: Let me start by saying shipping was fast ordered Friday received via USPS the following Monday. I ordered the premium hard oled screen kit for iPhone 11 pro max with premium tool kit, this also comes with the the display seal, Along with a back glass and new pentalobe screws. Now this is where my issue is, when i opened the package the tool kit was not there, understandable mistakes can be made, but it is the single upgrade they offer and I cant understand how it can be overlooked. Unlike the shipping you can expect 3-4 days for a customer service response. Do not waste your time calling, rings for 15secs and is sent to an automated voicemail. With no luck and in dire need of my phone i had to over night tools because i do not have anywhere locally that stocks them. After installing the screen, the display seal is trash would not come off the plastic, it works fine but touching the edges require more force and it may just be me but when typing it will almost always press an extra key or double tap space and add . Not sure how it will fair but if you are debating between this site and iFixit i would recommend to go ahead and spend the extra money with iFixit, I have always purchased my parts there and never once had an issue. I had there premium tool kit for years until and cant find it now. the back glass looks great and the screws are screws.Just an honest review of my experience, but take your chances🤷‍♀️

Review.Titre: False advertising for products
Review.Contenu: I ordered a white back glass for the Note 20 Ultra avoiding Amazon as I had seen a bunch of knock off versions with black camera bezels instead of the factory silver and chrome. After having the part I ordered from Repair Parts USA installed I realized I was deceived and misled.  The photos on the website showed a white back glass with a chrome and silver camera bezel as if it was from Samsung, the product on my phone had a black camera bezel which is exactly the knock offs they sell on Amazon.  I emailed the company to give them a chance to make it right and was asked to send a photo showing the product, which I did.  They then asked if I could send it back on my dollar and they would refund me, knowing full well from our previous correspondence it was already installed.  HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO SEND IT BACK UNTARNISHED NOW THAT I HAD IT INSTALLED?Terrible customer service in the way this was handled.  I will not purchase from them in the future and I certainly will not consider them as a wholesale supplier!

However I did manage to receive a new email asking me to rate your services. This is terrible on customer service and it made me look bad as an iPhone repairman. I ended up losing $200 to pay a company who have extra iPhone screens on site ready to use to fix the phone. I’m not asking for my $200 back that’s just the price of business, but I am demanding the money that I spent on both the screen and the camera part back. If I get these things back the review will be better but if not then I will make sure that I tell anybody I know about the bogus business that is repair parts USA.

Review.Titre: Multple orders had issues
Review.Contenu: Have received multiple orders from this site. Out of four orders, two have have damaged parts, missing parts, or parts that were for the wrong phone.I have tried to contact customer service multiple times and only one of the three issues were corrected. I waited for more than a week for one part to get corrected and I never heard back from them.Placed four orders with them and I will never place another as long as these problems persist.

Review.Titre: Very poor response from them
Review.Contenu: Very poor response from them. Apparently the item I ordered was on backorder but they did not let me know. I tried numerous times to reach the and they finally replied that it was on backorder. Still not mailed to me when they said it would be in. Left them another message via email to cancel my order. My real problem here is the Lach of communication. No one seems to care either. I won't be ordering from them in the furure.

Review.Titre: Pure Scammers. They dont care
Review.Contenu: This is one of the worst companies Ive worked with, they sent me a used scratches LCD, no big deal, they also sent me the wrong color of glass, I got the right color after some fighting, but the LCD they sent me was damaged, and wouldn't function, and I returned it, since than they have ghosted me on all accounts, and wont respond to my mail, I am hoping to take it to small claims court and get a settlement.

Review.Titre: Sent Wrong Product - No Refund
Review.Contenu: I ordered an OLED screen and received an LCD. The box was not labeled anywhere as an LCD so I installed it and noticed when I turned it on that it was NOT an OLED screen. I requested a return/ exchange for the correct product but was denied since the screen was considered “used”. Terrible experience… do not waste your money here.

Review.Titre: Ordered an iphone 12 pro replacement…
Review.Contenu: Ordered an iphone 12 pro replacement screen.  Received a shipment email for item when it never shipped.  After 4 phone calls and 3 emails with no response finally had to dispute charge with credit card company.  Total waste of time. If there was a way to give zero stars i would.

Review.Titre: No point of a warranty when you can't contact CS!
Review.Contenu: Ordered some Iphone x parts, specifically the rear housing with small parts attached. After a successful install I find the Wifi module is not working.I have reached out to Repair Parts USA 5 times now. email, text, phone and RMA return. Zero contact with me about my issue No point of a warranty when you can't contact customer service. AVOID THIS COMPANY!!!!!!

Review.Titre: This is a horrible company that sent a…
Review.Contenu: This is a horrible company that sent a screen that was cracked under the glass and told me they dont cover a installation failure. This was my first time ordering from them i usually shop elsewhere. I suggest u be very carefull ordering anything from here. I know i will order elsewhere from now on.

Review.Titre: Unprofessional
Review.Contenu: A kid of mine was harassed by employees for something I did in the past. On top of that the representative handling my case did not have to bring up my charges from the past or any of my stories yet he did to make himself feel better after my kid said we pursue with the correct authorities if working products are not sent. The representative got upset and looked up my name and tried to use it against me by looking at a past of mine which is very highly unprofessional. I have yet to give this company -5 stars.  If I'm going to let my child run the business creeps like this guy that done this needs to be either fired or in the dirt. His kind needs to be put away for good. I know he has a past he doesn't agree with as well. We don't know your name but we wouldn't be creepy enough to look up your name and dig up information on it like that's stalking. And I still might pursue a class action lawsuit against the company for defamation of characer and emotional distress. Thank you for listening

Review.Titre: Customer service was terrible
Review.Contenu: Customer service was terrible. I received a damaged product and this company basically called me a liar saying “the screen wouldn’t just randomly break”. This screen has been installed less than two days and is flickers and has a slight crack from being in my pocket. It is in a case and has not taken any abuse at all. They refused to resolve this matter, even the hardware issue. Do not give them your buisness.

Review.Titre: iPhone XS OLED screen replacement has…
Review.Contenu: iPhone XS OLED screen replacement has very bad quality. It cracked after a few days of use with reasonable pressure applied on the top. Customer service's excuse for no warranty was that the screen is not going to crack itself. Yes, that's true. But cellphone is something we use everyday, so the screen should have good quality to withstand normal use.

Review.Titre: Scammed - Do not use!
Review.Contenu: Scammed. Ordered, they did not ship for 4 days then cancelled order when I asked for support. Did not refund and am currently requesting refund from paypal. Do not purchase from!Additionally, after canceling and requesting refund they play ignorant and try to ship out parts after I already ordered (and received!) parts from elsewhere. Beyond shady!

Review.Titre: On 03/28/21 I made an order
Review.Contenu: On 03/28/21 I made an order, 228220, and never receive an email with the confirmation and also tracking status. On 04/02/21  Sent an email asking about my order and nobody answers me. Suddenly I received and email that my order has been shipped. My client have to expect more than usual due to you logistics procedures. Also the screens  come without camera and speaker holder.  So never again with you.

Review.Titre: If you want to return, they ignore your emails or any attempt to reach them
Review.Contenu: I bought iPhone display and cameras from them and display was good but camera quality was not anywhere near to OEM quality. So, I wanted to return and even confirmed with them before returning. Once I returned and sent them the tracking number and it was delivered to them but still after few months they did not process the refund and I tried to email and call and text, nothing worked. They email back very quickly when you want to buy or have a query but they forget you once you have any issue with the product or they need to return your money.

Review.Titre: No guarantee of functionality
Review.Contenu: I purchased a replacement screen for an iPhone 6s. Part was defective upon arrival but the defect was not apparent until after installation (how could I know 30% of the screen would not register touch input if I don’t install it?). Since it was installed, RepairPartsUSA would not and will not back up their products with any kind of guarantee or refund. Waste of money, there are better options than this service for equivalent prices.

Review.Titre: I GAVE YALL A ONE STAR BECAUSE ON THE…
Review.Contenu: I GAVE YALL A ONE STAR BECAUSE ON THE INFO OF THE PRODUCT I BOUGHT IT FAILED TO SAY IT WAS ON BACK ORDER AND IT CAME 2 WEEKS LATE. COSTING ME LATE HOME WORK ASSIGNMENTS, GOT FIRED FROM MY JOB, MISSED DOCTORS APPOINTMENTS and lets not forget PARENT TEACHER CONFERENCES. i would have NEVER ordered another SCREEN from you guys.... After i already bought TWO, (A MONTH BEFORE THIS) IF I WOULD OF KNOWN THE SCREEN WAS BACK ORDERED IM STILL PISSED ABOUT IT!

Review.Titre: MY SCREEN CAME BROKEN AND I ASKED FOR A…
Review.Contenu: MY SCREEN CAME BROKEN AND I ASKED FOR A NEW ONE AND HAVE YET TO RECIEVE IT!! THE CRACK WAS VERY SMALL AND WAS NOT NOTICABLE UNTIL I REPLACED THE OLD SCREEN WITH THE NEW ONE.. IT WAS ALSO GLITCHY AROUND THE CRACK, AND THE CRACK HAS ONLY GOTTEN BIGGER AND WORSE!! AWFUL !!!edit: THE CRACK WAS SMALL AND WAS NOT NOTICALBE UNTIL AFER THE INSTALLATION. I DID NOT DAMAGE THE SCREEN AS THESE PEOPLE THINK. THE CRACK IS SOMEHOW ON THE INSIDE YOU LITERALLY CANNOT TELL THERES A CRACK UNTIL YOU TURN IT ON

Review.Titre: I recently bought a screen/lcd for an…
Review.Contenu: I recently bought a screen/lcd for an iPhone 11 pro max.. I got the screen and upon initial inspection it was fine. Well I had it put in and it worked fine. For about three days. Then the screen started coming unattached from the lcd. After about 5 days of use the screen went black and has not been able to come on since. I paid 150$ for this part to work five days.... i tried to reach out to the company but have still yet to hear back about a refund or replacement so until then my review will stay the same.

Review.Titre: Quality is somewhat okay
Review.Contenu: Quality is somewhat okay, but the comunications could be better. An item of mine still hasnt shipped in a week or so.

Review.Titre: Screen doesn’t work every time you turn it on
Review.Contenu: So first the screen fits but it pops out of frame anot and have a otter box and it fell off the chair and cracked and sometimes the screen just dissent want to work so you have to turn it off then back on to get it to work

Review.Titre: so the parts came in pretty quickly and…
Review.Contenu: so the parts came in pretty quickly and i bought a toolkit as well, however the "complete" tool kit doesnt have the right bits to take apart an iphone fully, just the screen. The parts however are subpar, they work but are not original nor do they work like they should. i bought a replacement loud speaker for my iphone and its worse quality than before, it sounds like an old phone speaker. So parts are definitely used and not up to specs. so decent to get you by but don't expect to get your phone back to the way it used to be.  They can do better but just like most companies they don't care about quality just the money.  Id recommend getting brand new parts from iFixit.

Review.Titre: Overall your site is good
Review.Contenu: Overall your site is good. But your customer service is terrible. I emailed you twice before my package was even put in a box to be shipped, and never heard a reply. I strongly suggest you get a number for people to call because emailing you does not get a response.

Review.Titre: The actual product itself was good
Review.Contenu: The actual product itself was good, but the way it was packaged was pretty bad. The protective plastic was applied backwards. And the adhesive wasnt applied properly, so it peeled off when i tried to remove the plastic from it.

Review.Titre: Ear speakers ass screens work no feedback
Review.Contenu: Ear speaker is muffled but screens always 10/10 I recently bought a battery and asked them if the battery would give me a warning and if it would show the percentage but they never replied so I bought it anyways it does give you a warning but it does show battery percentage so this place is ok but be aware of what you buy something might be ass but the screens are ok next time email a person back come on bad help feedback

Review.Titre: Paid for best quality & the quality…
Review.Contenu: Paid for best quality & the quality isn’t that great. My keyboard doesn’t work properly

Review.Titre: I called multiple times nobody answered…
Review.Contenu: I called multiple times nobody answered it, left a voicemail nobody replied back, sent a reply through the email no response finally, I Got a email just telling me to ship it in back I wanted to speak  to somebody tech support about the problem I was having will buy from you again  Would have bought more stuff if they would answer the phone

Review.Titre: The digitizer was faulty and not…
Review.Contenu: The digitizer was faulty and not usable. Reattached the cable multiple times and no kinks but still was randomly activating the Lock Screen. I emailedthe help line and never heard back. Had to order a new one after waiting 2 weeks

Review.Titre: The touchscreen on the new screen does…
Review.Contenu: The touchscreen on the new screen does not work. Will be returning it.

Review.Titre: The protective cover seems not to fit…
Review.Contenu: The protective cover seems not to fit on the curved surfaces. I can use my fingers on the flat surface, if I press and hold.  But the curved surfaces I have to use the pen, which isn't always convenient.

Review.Titre: Pen stopped working
Review.Contenu: The pen I got originally was working and then it wouldn't link to my phone properly so it stopped working. In conclusion pen15.

Review.Titre: OLED screen for iPhone 11pro..
Review.Contenu: I ordered the OLED screen for my iPhone 11 Pro. Rating should be 1 but given 2 stars only because the screen works BUT the screen is not of good quality at all. It’s very dim, sharpness is low, and lacks balanced saturation of color so it’s kinda grayish. The screen looks brown when my phone screen dims. It sometimes does not respond when I'm trying to select something. The screen was inexpensive and that's probably the issue. I guess you get what you pay for.

Review.Titre: Multiple small issues
Review.Contenu: The first replacement screen ordered over a year ago had a slight hue difference. Enough to notice, but you get used to it. The second replacement screen I have ordered through this site did not work with the original home button - home button would not function at all. I replaced the new screen with the previous cracked screen and it worked again leading me to believe the replacement screen had an issue.

Review.Titre: Screen was good - no support
Review.Contenu: Screen was good. Tried calling, emailing and texting company to change order and never got response.

Review.Titre: Not impressed at all, sticking with my other distributor.
Review.Contenu: I ordered 3 things: an iPhone 8 screen, a magnetic pad, and battery tape. The pad was cracked, the screen had a very high degree of "washing out" when viewed from anything over about 30 degrees, and it took almost a week to be delivered. I'm assuming the tape works, but I haven't used it. I'll stick with my other distributor (not naming who since this could read as an advert).

Review.Titre: The issues that I'm having is with…
Review.Contenu: The issues that I'm having is with their shipping processing is taking too long ship and charger for shipping. there other company that don't charger shipping and arrive on time.I have lost customers for shipping delay/problem. But I would say their product is great can't complain there

Review.Titre: I am very pleased with the product but…
Review.Contenu: I am very pleased with the product but the return process is very flawed ... bought my item in May and returned a wrong item and still haven’t got a refund or explanation of why it hasn’t been refunded RMA number issued to me was 232471 I have made several attempts with the tracking info showing it was received but still nothing .... again great product bad return experience

Review.Titre: Bad iPhone 8 Screen - Color, FPS, Touch, Viewing Angle.. all bad
Review.Contenu: Low res, low frame rate, bad colors, weird touch glitches. Bought the "Premium" iPhone 8 screen and its bad. About to just put the old scratched screen back on. Leaving this review because they said I'd get a $10 rebate for leaving a review.Website worked well and shipping was quick. Never heard back from anyone when I asked why the screen was so terrible.

Review.Titre: It said same day shipping but since I…
Review.Contenu: It said same day shipping but since I ordered it late it should’ve been shipped the next day or so I thought... it has been 2 days since and I have gotten no other email but the confirmation. They took out the money but haven’t shipped. I’m going to try to be patient and wait but if another day passes I might just have to cancel my order. I’m hoping that they reply to either my email or this review so I can know what’s going on.

Review.Titre: It snapped and cracked not 10 minutes…
Review.Contenu: It snapped and cracked not 10 minutes after I installed it.

Review.Titre: The pen is constantly selecting things…
Review.Contenu: The pen is constantly selecting things I don't want and the cursor jumps all over and clicks what I don't want. I can't use it.

Review.Titre: Overall
Review.Contenu: Since I paid extra for expedite shipping. I received my first order within 4 days but the 2nd order took almost 2 weeks(paid shipping). Their products are good quality. The last order one of the cables for the screen replacement was too short.. They usually reply back quickly but they have not replied back to me about my last order. They do charge restocking fee.

Review.Titre: Now although I always get my phone…
Review.Contenu: Now although I always get my phone repair stuff from this website I feel like I was absolutely scammed today I order an IPhone 7 Plus replacement screen ( the digitizer glass screen with small parts ) and nothing worked at all after playing the 38.99 im very upset my phone doesn’t even wanna turn on this screen doesn’t work one bit it’s something wrong with it it’s either the parts that go to this phone other than that this phone doesn’t work with this screen and this screen is a rip off horrible screen

Review.Titre: Product came fast but did not meet expectations
Review.Contenu: The product did come pretty fast. But I really hate the fact that the screen itself is making my iPad crazy, I was in the middle of a meeting and it would turn on and off. It even make my iPad restart on its own. If these products are the type of products you sell for iPads, I would not recommend this to anyone. Please let your costumers know these facts before they spend money on parts that don’t function properly.

Review.Titre: Shortchanged refund, poor comms
Review.Contenu: Despite contacting RepairPartsUSA by email just minutes after it became apparent a part was duplicated in my order, they responded a day later saying they could not remove the duplicate AND did NOT refund me IN FULL.  The parts I did receive were as requested.  So disappointed in the delayed response and faulty website.

Review.Titre: I ordered a replacement battery for my…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a replacement battery for my Samsung Galaxy Note 9. Battery had horrible life. I all steps completed per instructions and I made sure the batter was completely discharged and recharged to 100%. I would get about 3 hours per charge. I could just have the phone sitting on my desk, not using it and the battery percentage would be dropping. After 2 weeks, the battery swelled destroying the back glass. Removed battery and purchased from a different seller.

Review.Titre: Screen did not work
Review.Contenu: Screen did not work, sent an email, never heard from anyone about it. I reinstalled my cracked screen & bought a new phone. I threw out the screen I ordered & just chalked it up to never again would I try to replace my phones screen. A reply or a refund would have been nice.

Review.Titre: Fast and easy order but lack of responsiveness with defective item
Review.Contenu: Fast and easy order. Item arrived promptly but was missing a screwdriver. After contacting the seller they send a replacement right away. The screen I ordered and installed was defective as the lower part was not responsive to touch. Several emails requesting replacement/returning the item remained unanswered. Installed a screen from a different seller which works just fine. Would probably not order again from them.

Review.Titre: Go Somewhere Else
Review.Contenu: Screen is terrible. Bought the “Premium” iPhone 8 screen + digitizer. Didn’t expect OEM quality but it’s bad. Viewing angle is terrible (it turns white if you look at it from any angle), touch interface is all over the place and im hitting random keys when my cracked screen worked just fine. it’s significantly darker than my iPhone 7 screen as well.Shopping experience was easy and shipping was quick. Product is trash.Edit: Forgot to mention, I reached out weeks ago asking if I was given a bad screen, non-premium maybe. Never heard a word from them.

Review.Titre: Long delivery
Review.Contenu: I had chosen the USPS first class (3-4 days) and received my product almost 2 week later. They didn’t even notify me that the shipping was going to be delayed until I email them. A week after I place the order was when I  decided to email them, they reply back. It was along the lines of your product is now in shipment. That’s sooooo frustrating.

Review.Titre: Very long arrival time without notice
Review.Contenu: I'm only giving this a 2 because of how long the item is taking to get here. I ordered it on the 11th and on the 23rd I finally got a notice saying it was shipped. The notice said it was shipped on the 12th but remained in Florida all that time. There should be some notice that the company is experiencing these issues before ordering and making you wait so long. I can't review on the actual product yet. I will update when it arrives.

Review.Titre: Worthless Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I have used this company many years as a business and personal. Unfortunately I am rating a poor rating for lack of good customer service. I never received my package and the USPS even admitted to loosing it the response fro Repairpartsusa is "its out of our control" Seriously what kind of crap is that? Even knowing the package was lost they are not willing to help retrieve the items I purchased and wants me to repurchase them.

Review.Titre: No Tracking Information or response
Review.Contenu: I ordered a iPhone 7 Plus screen and it was shipped the 19th after I had gotten ahold of customer service the first time. A week passed and I sent a email asking about the tracking information. No response. Few days later I texted and no response. It’s going to be nearly two weeks now and I got nothing. Don’t know really know what to say at this point. Just really disappointed that I have been patient and there’s nothing to show for it. I understand that Usps may be unreliable but at the same time I feel communication is important.

Review.Titre: Can’t ship to address other than billing. Form is wrong.
Review.Contenu: Their form has a check mark that asks if shipping address is different than billing address. However, they cancelled my order because they can’t ship to a different address! Why have that in your form! It wasn't /isn't fraud! It's me trying to buy a holder and have it sent directly to my Dad. Now, I have to send it here, then send it there, paying for shipping twice.

Review.Titre: The premium iPhone screens ARE NOT PREMIUM!
Review.Contenu: At least in my instance with the 6s Plus. They have b grade sensitivity that gets real annoying when scrolling through videos on YouTube, misclicking on a video in the middle of a scroll, they also have a fake force touch that relies on surface area rather than pressure. Spend a little more money on a real screen that is oem spec from sites like ifixit. The prices are going to be doubled, but it’s way better than what you pay for this garbage.

Review.Titre: Good service, disappointed in parts’ quality
Review.Contenu: I ordered a screen for an iPhone and tools to change it. One screw driver was defective, so I ended up using a small knife instead of it. Eventually, I got a replacement but it took 2 extra weeks. The new screen worked great for the first week. After that time it started glitching — it wasn’t sensing the touch, first, occasionally, later, almost all the time. It’s been about a month since I change the screen. The phone is basically not usable. Will have to get a new phone I guess

Review.Titre: Failed using the credit card payment option
Review.Contenu: Using the credit card payment option would never complete, it would show a circling icon but never progress. After three attempts I used the PayPal payment option which was convoluted because it took me back to the order payment page after I filled out the PayPal info. Needs to be cleaned up and make it work.

Review.Titre: Pretty crappy experience
Review.Contenu: Parts were not the best when shipped to me. Had missing items from my order, my electronic parts were not shipped in proper packaging and were ruined upon delivery. Still havent recieved a refund or my missing parts. If you had another option to get parts from. I highly suggest you do find another place

Review.Titre: bad customer service
Review.Contenu: A good website with product quality options + explanations of each tier. The problem is that the product quality options don't end up mattering! Got a screen that is more grey than an OEM screen and no color settings within iPhone can fix it. I contacted customer support nearly a week ago and they still haven't responded. IFixit's support responded in 23 min. Buying from there in the future even though it is slightly more expensive

Review.Titre: Very hard to get in contact with company
Review.Contenu: Update: I was finally able to get a response through email. Tracking number still shows no progress. Hopefully I'll eventually get my item, but not within the time frames stated on the site.I ordered a screen repair kit on a Tuesday night, and expected it to ship next day since the page showed it would ship same day for in stock items. 3 days go by and it still doesn't show shipped. I try calling, it goes to voicemail. I leave a voicemail, as well as sending a text message. No response at all. Trying an email as last resort, but thinking I may just have to dispute the order and place an order through Amazon or something. Don't trust this company.

Review.Titre: Their website says same day shipping
Review.Contenu: Their website says same day shipping, but it’s more like a week just to ship. They won’t send you the tracking number until a day before it arrives. You have to email them constantly. Ordered twice from them, same experience. Won’t do it again. Products are okay. The wiring for the IPad is flimsy. It was hard to insert the parts because they bend like crazy. The original parts are sturdy, which is why I know the difference. I don’t recommend them.

Review.Titre: Bought replacement synthesizer for…
Review.Contenu: Bought replacement synthesizer for iPhone 6plusUsed my original thumbprint button and it would no longer read my thumbprint.  Texted them twice and emailed them once but no response.  Replaced with old cracked screen and button worked properly.  Bought another one from a different supplier.

Review.Titre: HAVE CALLED 4 TIMES AND NO ONE HAS …
Review.Contenu: HAVE CALLED 4 TIMES AND NO ONE HAS CALLED ME BACK. I FINALLY GOT AHOLD OF SOMEONE AND THEY SAID THEY WOULD SEND ME AN EMAIL WITH THE RETURN INFO AND IT HAS BEEN ALMOST 2 WEEKS AND STILL NO EMAIL. I HAVES CALLED BACK AND STILL HAVE GOTTEN NO RESPONSE. I GUESS THEY ARE WAITING FOR MY 90 DAYS RETURN POLICY TO RUN OUT. I HAVE A DEFECTIVE PART AND JUST WANT TO EXCHANGE IT. ORDER NUMBER 27982

Review.Titre: Not premium quality whatsoever

After the assembling the phone the screen had a spot bc it is pressing on to the screen. Overall bad experience with this screen. I have used other replacements and this is the one that’s given me trouble the most.

Review.Titre: Defective Screen
Review.Contenu: I purchased a lcd and glass for an Iphone 6.  It took a lot longer than estimated for my item to arrive.  After it arrived and installed there was a light spot in the middle of the screen, which I was originally ready to deal with.  The next day that small white spot metastasized into a large black bar running from the point where the light spot started to the bottom edge of the screen. (See my profile photo)

Review.Titre: Decent screen, Bad customer service
Review.Contenu: Ordered a 7+ screen assembly. After I installed the "premium" screen according to them. I found that it was much more grey than the OEM ones. It makes you feel like you are colorblind when looking at your phone. I messaged support and have not heard back in the last couple of days. To sum this up. The part came working yes. But if there is a problem, customer service is important. I will be buying from IFixit in the future. (their support responded in 23 min)

Review.Titre: Not such a great screen replacement
Review.Contenu: The glass screen I ordered for my iphone 5 s was badly built.  One of the holes to put a screw in was completely filled in with plastic or wax.  I had to use a small screwdriver to scrape it off.  there was no place to clip in one of the metal hook.  I compared this screen with my old screen.  My old screen had a slot in which the hook cliped in.I didn't bother calling them back because I didnt wan to wait another week for the parts to come again.

Review.Titre: I replaced the screen on my iPhone XR…
Review.Contenu: I replaced the screen on my iPhone XR In December and now the LED is starting to go out. The screen isn’t cracked and I keep a new case on the phone. It will not register to touch 75% of the time and when it does register touch then it does not last long. I was happy with the product until now.

Review.Titre: This is low quality and arrived…
Review.Contenu: This is low quality and arrived bent,t even though i chose them because I read the brand name on the product and paid more even though there were much cheaper choices on other web sites.  I sent them a picture how it arrived and was promptly refunded the money no hassle.  Thank you for that much, but definitely not worth the money.

Review.Titre: I ordered a replacement screen fro my…Samsung S7 Edge
Review.Contenu: I ordered a replacement screen fro my Samsung S7 Edge vs purchasing a new phone. First, the package took a week from RepairParts to Massachusetts due to shipping through Puerto Rico...ok not RP's fault. Then the item was not the same as the advertised picture. Did NOT come with the frame as described. I have spent days trying to get an answer on return or replacement and is still unresolved. Very little customer service through phone or messenger.  I am hopeful this situation can be rectified soon! I just want to fix my phone.

Review.Titre: Just after I ordered I realized that…
Review.Contenu: Just after I ordered I realized that the screen protector was broken not the glass, but company wouldn’t take it back.Yes they did offer to return it with instructions, but I only spent $25 and they wanted a $10 restocking fee and I had to pay for shipping. Wasn’t worth the time

Review.Titre: It was far too time consuming and…
Review.Contenu: It was far too time consuming and difficult to place the order. It should not take a week to finalize an order. This company is more focused on collecting my business and personal information than meeting my parts needs.

Review.Titre: My initial order was here somewhat …
Review.Contenu: My initial order was here somewhat quickly and was what i had ordered. Unfortunately i had ordered the wrong screen but you guys agreed if i sent this one back you would have the right one sent to me. I shipped it back and sent you the tracking number as requested, but have not heard another word. Ive emaied about 5 times no with no reply, and the first lcd screen had been delivered according to usps website. Why is no one getting back to me? i need this phone for work.

Review.Titre: Parts arrived 2 days after original …
Review.Contenu: Parts arrived 2 days after original shipping estimate. New part has a bit of damage to power edge of screen but isn't shattered like the old one so I installed it a new screen "glitches" every so often, doesn't turn off when phone up to face (yes the ambient sensors are installed correctly) and the pressure points on the screen do not work on the right side. Very frustrating. Oh yeah, and that orange suction cup doesn't auction worth a darn either.

Review.Titre: I never received my order even though…
Review.Contenu: I never received my package and had to email the company numerous times to inquire about getting a replacement or refund. Wasnt until i wrote a negative review that i was finally contacted.  I did end up getting a full refund after numerous emails to the company. Poor customer service experience over all.

Review.Titre: faker battery capacity
Review.Contenu: faker battery capacity, the original samsung battery is 3500mAh, but the one I bought from repair part is around 2400 mAh.By the way, the plastic repair tools are fragile, they are worse than the tools which I bring  from China.I am upset with this website, except things are cheap and the mail is fast.

The screen was in perfect condition but I had to pay a fee and for the return shipping. Basically I just lost my time and money. Want a professional customer service and your money back? Do not buy from them.

Review.Titre: Screen replacEment - Power draining and inaccurate
Review.Contenu: UPDATED From google: screen sensitivity is much lower and often inaccurate; power consumption from screen has increased, and even shut my phone off because it “couldn't maintain power to screen”; and my phone has been getting hot faster. I’ll update again with a second update after replacing this screen again.Ordered online for a screen and new battery, for my girlfriend’s iPhone 7 Plus.I initially ordered for the wrong model of iPhone and within 24hrs their customer support refunded and cancelled my order, so that I could re-order the correct parts. Review.Titre: Galaxy S7 Charging Port Cable
Review.Contenu: I ordered a replacement charging port cable for my Samsung Galaxy S7 at a great price, and Repairpartsusa was very gracious to combine that order with another so that I'd only incur one shipping charge. The item came promptly and seemed to be in good condition, but upon installation it turned out my phone could no longer connect to the cell network, and the part needed to be replaced again. I was short on time so just had a repair shop use one in their inventory, so I don't know if I could've had repairpartsusa issue a functioning replacement. My experience with them was seamless and their prices are affordable, but a defective part rendered the overall experience negative.

Review.Titre: Decent Products but zero customer service.
Review.Contenu: Have made two different orders with them. 1 defective part in each order. I work in the phone repair industry and know it happens, no big deal. My main issue is with lack of customer and service poor website design.My second order was split up and delayed considerably because they were out of a screen, they took 10% off order which I appreciated.  I am unable to select the items on the website to initiate an RMA. Additionally, despite calling 5+times over the last 4 weeks and sending an email 4 days ago, I have had ZERO contact. Very frustrated with their poor RMA process on their website and poor customer service.

Review.Titre: BUYERS BEWARE, False advertising and bad parts..
Review.Contenu: BUYERS BEWARE: False advertising, screen is not fully functional.. Although it says they same day if ordered before 4pm.. They do not... Took them 5 days to drop off my part to the post office and my screen a week to get here.. I got my part today so I took the screen and my phone to a professional repair shop to have it fixed.. Paid the installment fee and waited... Screen looks ok but it has a dead spot on the left side of the digitizer above the letter A.. Faulty screen.. Now I'm still stuck with a broke phone after waiting a week for the parts to arrive.. I tried contacting customer care to have them send a replacement over night and I still haven't heard anything back...  These people are a joke.. This is my first time doing business with this company and definitely my last... 🙄😒

Review.Titre: Today (Sunday) I was asked to write a…
Review.Contenu: Today (Sunday) I was asked to write a review off Repairpartsusa.  I haven't received the order yet so my review is based on the promptness of getting orders out.  I ordered the parts last Sunday, received a tracking number on Monday but, based on the tracking information, the carrier did not receive the item for shipment until Thursday.  So now I'm asked to write a review and, if they checked the tracking information, they would know that I won't receive the product until Monday and therefore I can not provide a full review.  I'm rating them with 2 stars because they were too slow in shipping.  I realize that there can be many contributing factors, that I'm not aware of, but that is all I have to base my review.

Same box, same packaging, never even took it out but was charged a restocking fee of 15% and had to pay for my own shipping.  Lastly, and most important, I am pretty sure they were not worried about giving me back my refund (which was barely anything after considering shipping charges and “restocking fee”) until I emailed, AGAIN! They received my item on the 5th. I emailed them on the 16th and had to ask for the whereabouts before any action was taken. Terrible.

Review.Titre: The Price Was Too Good To Be True
Review.Contenu: Received my tempered glass screen protector for my Galaxy S10+ yesterday after 5pm. It arrived relatively fast, hence the 2 star rating. I cleansed my screen, followed the steps, and applied the screen protector. At first, it was wonderful. Full coverage, the whole nine yards. Then just now, it has up and fallen right off of my cellphone. The ONLY adhesive on this screen protector is right around the edges and around the rim of the hole for the fingerprint scanner. The remainder of the screen protector is bare, therefore not adhering to the cell phone. On top of that, the protector itself does not sit snug against the phones screen whatsoever, making connection from your fingertips to the screen nearly impossible. Long story short, it was too good to be true for the super low price, I should have known better. Lesson learned.

Review.Titre: Not saying boycott, but buyers beware!
Review.Contenu: The first screen they sent was defective, which happens, no big deal, what keeps them from getting five stars is, before I even sent it back for them to inspect, they implied that I broke the screen,  essentially calling me a liar,  then made me pay for the shipping back.  Their return policy really needs to be  reconsidered.  On top of all this the fact that they couldn’t be bothered, (FOR TEN DAYS) to confirm that they had received the broken screen after I paid to have it shipped back to them, emailed them multiple times, and nearly bought a new one from another company, really irritated me,  So to make a long story short I am fine with the products of this place but not the customer service. Can’t say I would recommend, but if they had something I couldn’t find elsewhere I would buy from them again, if I had to.

It will get the job done but with noticeable degradation in image quality. Haptic response is good and the part came with all tools needed for replacement.

Shipping costs were way too high
Review.Contenu: Shipping costs were way too high. Our company ships small items all over and we never have the kind of shipping costs that were charged to us. Also, I paid for 2 to 3 day USPS and my item took a week to get here. 5 business days and 1 Saturday. Totally unacceptable. (Especially for the shipping costs.) The part was fine, ordering wasn't too difficult but improvements in the distribution area of your company is definitely needed. To answer their reply: RepairPartsUSA claimed they shipped on Monday. The shipment wasn't sent until October 11th (even per their email confirmation) which was TUESDAY. The shipment arrived on Friday, October 14th. And yes, I agreed to and paid for '2 to 3 days shipping' but that is NOT what I got. If I am going to pay the higher shipping fees, I expect the item to arrive as promised.

I had to pay return postage and a 15% restocking fee. After several follow-ups via voicemail & email, I received my refund. Overall I'm not too happy, but I will say if the proper tool had been included it would've been an overall good value.

Review.Titre: Great price , battery discharging
Review.Contenu: I received the battery and it has been installed, the battery works fine no issues,I am very impressed how timely the delivery was. And the service The company provide.Recently the battery started to discharge at a faster pace, I am concerned how the battery does not hold the charge any more .

Review.Titre: I really like ordering from…
Review.Contenu: I really like ordering from Repairpartsusa - easy to use site and great products. But their lifetime warranty is questionable. I tried returning a product for fitment issues and was contacted shortly after. However, after a few message back and forth with customer service, they stopped replying. So I was not given lifetime warranty and unable to return my product - not even an exchange for a new one.

Review.Titre: Delayed shipping and overall confusion
Review.Contenu: After ordering, I had a few weeks with no communication or shipping date. When I reached out they offered me a refund or to wait. They said they didn't have what I wanted in stock and were waiting on a backordered shipment from China. Since I needed the item I waited. When it was listed for delivery, it was listed as a cheaper item that looks the same but had fewer functionalities. When I recieved the item though, it was the correct one. Overall, a headache but I got what I wanted even though it took a while.

Review.Titre: Initially shipped me the wrong item
Review.Contenu: Initially shipped me the wrong item.  When I shipped it back, it took about 2 weeks to receive the correct item in the mail.  And, it was difficult to communicate with customer service to get the issue resolved.  However, the issue was eventually resolved.

Review.Titre: Average
Review.Contenu: I ordered a screen for an iPhone 8 Plus, it’s okay, doesn’t respond to touch sometimes. The screen protector for it is good, but the screen protector I ordered for a galaxy note 9 broke right away & it only has adhesive on the edges, & the repair kit for phones is not good, they wear off quick even before you finish taking a phone apart.

Review.Titre: Purchasing is standard/easy
Review.Contenu: Purchasing is standard/easy. You find your product, add to cart, enter information and purchase. Customer service is good. They are quick to reply and help with any issues but the parts aren’t all that great in quality(or at least what I purchased). I purchased a screen and the home button would not work with it and it had two weird holes close to the home button, one on each side. Shopping is easy and customer service is good but the faulty product and no cash back or product replacement sets me in the middle with 3/5 stars.

Review.Titre: Here I am again!
Review.Contenu: Here I am again!! My defective screen was sent back and when they received it I was to get a phone call (they don't call you) and or an email (takes days to receive) to replace the defective screen with a better one. I feel as if I was robbed at this point now. No communication!! Do not buy from this place!!!Update *** I was refunded my money but this company really needs to work on customer service

Review.Titre: So far so good
Review.Contenu: So far so good. Only placed the order will update once completed order. I will say though I was denied a wholesale account on no basis. I have a valid ein and I do repairs so I’m not sure what the issue was. It’s cool they had my part but I guess I’ll keep buying where I been buying.

Review.Titre: I returned my item about 2-3 weeks ago…
Review.Contenu: I returned my item about 2-3 weeks ago now. I still haven’t gotten a refund. When I reached out to the company no one got back with me and I had to reach out again where the lady immediately responded to my text. The lack of communication and customer service needs to be improved.

Review.Titre: Good products but extremely hard to get…
Review.Contenu: Good products but extremely hard to get ahold of. I called for 3 days straight multiple times to cancel an order. Replied to the email and texted. Then finally got ahold of them to find out it was already shipped. Then had to pay a restocking fee. Good products. Bad customer service.

Review.Titre: IPhone 11 Pro Replacement Screen
Review.Contenu: Super fast shipping (came the day after I ordered) but the screen is NOT face ID compatible. Not sure if this is intentional but it is not advertised on the website. IPhone 11 Pro Premium Black Soft OLED And Digitizer Glass Screen ReplacementCODE:I11PRO-PREM-SCREEN

Review.Titre: I may give them a second chance..
Review.Contenu: They said they shipped my screen replacement 6/1 but never received a tracking number. Tried calling,  tried email with no response. It's now 6/18 and still no product. . Update: although it took 1 month after writing a review on here they sent what I ordered and it came quickly.

Review.Titre: Good product... snail mail slow shipping
Review.Contenu: I can understand the issues that COVID-19 might have with shipping, however, your site mentioned rapid delivery of your product. All other items sent via USPS that I have ordered elsewhere arrived within 2 to 5 days. Your product was 2 weeks or longer. Therefore a rating of 3.

Review.Titre: Works well enough for the price
Review.Contenu: Shipping was timely. Screen was fine, had a digitizer/touch response issue on the top after I installed it but otherwise works well enough.I would have gone for the higher quality option offered if I were to order again from this company

Review.Titre: Slow shipping. But they resolved it.
Review.Contenu: Received everything I ordered as advertised. They were a bit slow on shipping. It took about a week for any notification to show up saying that my item shipped, then USPS never actually received the item from them. When I inquired they re-shipped the item and refunded my shipping cost,  so that was good of them.

Review.Titre: I wish their was a way to give a 2.7 rating...
Review.Contenu: I wish their was a way to give a 2.7 as a rating but I cannot. First of all, I would like to thanks the people at RepairPartsUSA for adding a free tool kit after I forgot to add it to my order. Secondly, the shipping took longer than stated but I understand why it took longer than usual due to the holidays + their wholesale shipping process. I'm not mad at that. I am upset about the quality of the screen I ordered. Not only is the screen a tad bit thicker than the original apple screen but its also super glitchy. Without me touching it the screen will just move around and its very annoying. I want to go through the refund process but i do not know where to start. Please help resolve this issue.

Review.Titre: Not bad
Review.Contenu: Not bad. However, the stylus wS not original as stated. It scratches the glass surface, when removed from the portal, I don't get the warning sign that the pen is missing. So I don't think it is original but it will do untill I get the real thing. Thank you anyway for fast delivery.

Review.Titre: My reason for not giving a 5 star is…
Review.Contenu: My reason for not giving a 5 star is because I had Issues with a part and communication was not good. I had a screen that was defective; I had to go get the phone fixed either way. Another part I ordered was not shipped and they wrote on a piece of paper that it was out of stock. I had to ask if I was going to get a refund first which they then said, the part will be shipped once they get some shipped to them. I have not received any update on the part being shipped or getting a replacement or refund for the defective screen. Other than that, everything else was great.

Review.Titre: I ordered two day shipping and the part…
Review.Contenu: I ordered two day shipping and the part has still not arrived even though they stated it was shipped Monday, I have made repeated attempts to contact the company to no avail. ABSENT CUSTOMER SERVICE.Edit: Good condition part arrived 2 days late. Still no response from customer service.

Review.Titre: Site was easy to use & order from
Review.Contenu: Site was easy to use & order fromFirst order reported my CC was declinedSecond order reported my CC was declined againSecond order I received email that it was being shippedI emailed to cancel other orderReceived email other order shipped Now have 2

Review.Titre: Not Zero customer service
Review.Contenu: Update: After this review, I sent another email and they informed me my items had shipped two days ago. That's great, and I've added a star. If they can fix their notifications, or make it possible to see the status of an order, that would be ideal. I placed two orders last week, and they have yet to ship them. I've emailed and called during their business hours, but so far no luck. I'm hoping the products aren't as bad as their service. I was glad to read the good comments about their customer service - maybe there is hope, and this business isn't a scam.

Review.Titre: Good company
Review.Contenu: Good company. But wish they would last longer have gone through 3 screens in the last months and this last time I bought the screen protector and after dropping it the actual screen was cracked not Bebe the protector cracked. It just cracked the actual screen

Review.Titre: Bought two iPhone 6 batteries
Review.Contenu: Bought two iPhone 6 batteries, one worked fine, the other had some exposed metal that arced when the cover screws were replaced (the professional technicians description).  I had to go two days without a phone because it wouldn't work, then had to pay $50 to have the problem diagnosed and a new battery installed.  I requested a refund and quickly received an email asking that I return it and provide a tracking number so I could get an exchange.  It wasn't worth it to pay $5 to return a $10 battery just to get an extra battery that I don't need anymore.  I'll just keep it and take the loss.

Review.Titre: Think twice before buying
Review.Contenu: The products are cheap but the return policy terrible no free shipping + no return shipping cost covered + 15% restocking fee. so basically you will end up in paying for the even you don't like the product. I ordered $9.99 item and paid $3.99 for shipping.unfortunately I didn't like the product I had to return I paid another $4.29 for shipping also they charge 15% restocking fee which is $1.5 so I paid 3.99(initial shipping ) + 4.29 (Return shipping) + 1.5 total of $9.78 so basically I lost my entire money. First time i am trying outside of amazon and learnt my lesson..please think twice before you buy it.

Review.Titre: Items good quality, but service is lacking in 3 areas
Review.Contenu: The items are good quality, but the customer service response time and cross communication among there own staff about matters is lagging. Also, make sure to select correct item the first time, because if you make a mistake they have no way to stop your order from processing to edit it. Its an order and its final company. No options for you until item is received and have to pay out of pocket to send back with no reimbursements of any shipping n handling. You have to repeat yourself when addressing a concern with a different staff member then previous. Customer service response is overall a tad bit slow but not awful.

Review.Titre: Overall
Review.Contenu: Overall, the company offers unbeatable prices.  The Shipping the same day advertisement is misleading as you have to read in the find print that the order not only has to be placed by a particular time AND has to processed by the business by that same time to be shipped same day.  Also, paying extra for the 2-3 day delivery, a waste of money because it arrives in the same time as the standard shipping.  We will continue to buy from because of pricing & accurate information on their products however, we do not expect an quick delivery of our order which in previous our 2 orders took an average of a week to be delivered.

Review.Titre: Only 3 stars
Review.Contenu: In my opinion the graphics on the premium screens look better than even the originals however the durability still isnt good enough on top of that i have gotten a faulty power flex for an iphone 6 and ive had late parts which puts me behind schedule

Review.Titre: Received both wrong camera's the …
Review.Contenu: Received both wrong camera's the battery gave us nothing but problems, haven't been able to get in touch to get my money back, the only thing that worked was the screen. Had to open the phone up twice to get it fixed right.-edit; received refund. Thanks.

Review.Titre: Parts arrived sooner than expected
Review.Contenu: Parts arrived sooner than expected, screen I ordered did not work very good had to get another one ordered on amazon and it worked fine. Not blaming repairpartsusa, I may have picked a poor quality part. Other parts ordered worked just fine.

Review.Titre: I've only just purchased some parts
Review.Contenu: I've only just purchased some parts. As far as that goes it was easy to lookup and find everything I needed. I wish they had parts for other kinds of phones besides  iPhone and Samsung. I  update review upon receipt of items.

Review.Titre: Double check your parts before unpackaging
Review.Contenu: First off, I am a technician and am familiar with working on small electronics. I purchased a repait part for my iPad. It didn't work. I double checked all hardware connections but the "new" part did not work. On further inspection, it did not EXACTLY resemble the part I was repairing leading me to believe that it was not an OEM part. For the 3 or 4 dollars I paid for it plus the 17.00 in shipping, I wasn't about to try and extract it to send it back. So, yeah, can't give them 1 star because they were prompt with shipment, but can't give them 5 stars because it was NOT an apple iPad OEM part.

Review.Titre: This review is based only upon the ordering process
Review.Contenu: This review is based only upon the ordering process as I've yet to receive my purchased items. I realize in this time of covid 19 that many customer service reps are working from home (which is the case with this company according to their automated attendant). From the problems and amount of time involved with placing my order I believe this company is lacking in this area. I attempted to place the order on their website numerous times but it would simply display a message "loading". I left a couple of voicemail messages but were never returned. I finally was able to finalize the order using a different cc. I hope the order arrives as promised. Will update...

Review.Titre: My last order came in too late and not…
Review.Contenu: My last order came in too late and not the date that I paid extra shipping for. The good news is; it was the correct parts. I willing to pay extra now to get my parts here on time so I will not loose another customer. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Screwdrivers that come with the kit are poorly made
Review.Contenu: I ordered an iphone screen.  The screen itself was fine, but the tools that came with the screen fell apart on me. I had to order a new set of screwdrivers to be able to finish replacing my screen.

Review.Titre: items impossible to return/exchange
Review.Contenu: fast delivery, be careful not to order a wrong part, i sent 2 emails to exchange  a wrong item i ordered. no response.. i called customer service on hold forever never did speak to anyone or was able to return the item...

Review.Titre: I ordered a replacement stylus for my…

Review.Titre: Order not received- resolved!
Review.Contenu: I ordered a black S-Pen for a Galaxy Note8, order #119942, and received a notification that it was shipped on November 26- it never arrived. I opened a ticket with USPS who verified they delivered to the wrong address. USPS says it is unrecoverable and that the sender (This company) is required to file a claim with them and issue me a refund. I have called over 60 times, emailed, and left messages, all with no response. At this point I would like either a full refund or for the item to be sent to me again. Please honor your high customer reviews and provide me an immediate response. Thank you.I recieved an immediate response and a full refund, I am now re ordering the package, thanks!

Review.Titre: I give them a 3 star
Review.Contenu: I give them a 3 star. The products are in good shape but they really don’t last long. My screen went out after the second one I ordered and currently have to order a 3rd(I cracked my original screen). Also they should include in the shipping section that the time doesn’t include processing. If I pay for two-day shipping, that’s what I expect. Especially since they state that they do same day shipping and processing before a certain time. Also, you can never speak to customer service. They are always “currently assisting another customer”. You can text the number as well but it may take several hours for a response. The response may not even be what you need to know either. I guess the best thing is the prices. Cheaper than most places I see.

Review.Titre: Cheap price
Review.Contenu: Found what I was looking for extremely fast and easy. Also cheap price is hard to beat. Just ordered a few min ago so I'll finish my review and give more stars if all goes accordingly in like 4 days.

Review.Titre: Received iPhone new screen from…
Review.Contenu: Received iPhone new screen from Repairpartsusa.  After installing the TouchId sensor from my old cracked screen everything worked perfectly for a couple of days until the new screen went completely black.   Repairpartsusa sent a replacement screen but I had to pay the cost of shipping the dead screen back to them.  The replacement screen worked except my original TouchId sensor will not work with the replacement screen.   After testing I determined the TouchId sensor does work with the original cracked screen so I know that part is not the problem.  Repairpartsusa did not respond to my request for help.   I am using the phone without the TouchId working but I will live with it until this screen fails and then I will look elsewhere for a replacement.

Review.Titre: Good product, mediocre customer service
Review.Contenu: The screen I received was not fitting. So I emailed them and it took 3 days for customer service to reply. In the end, the issue was my fault, nonetheless, customer service is lacking.

Review.Titre: Was not really impressed with the product and costumer service
Review.Contenu: The product came. The packaging was not impressive. Small box and inside were the iPhone 8 Plus screen replacement and the tools that I ordered separately for it. There were not any soft material in the box to prevent the items shifting or moving in the box. One of the tools was broken. I ordered their premium quality screen and changed it using YouTube video. I applied little bit of strength making sure the screen was sit tightly into the phone but unfortunately the screen got cracked. I did the same to my other iPhone 7 to see if it would crack and it was rock solid. Therefore, I was not impressed with the quality of the screen. Called and texted the company to discuss this but no phone call and only short, distant text reply saying that it happens all the time. So no more business with this company for me.

Review.Titre: I phone 5 screen
Review.Contenu: The part came a little late but it was packed neatly and there was no damage. Although with some use of the screen the screen has become harder to control or glitchy

Review.Titre: Fixed my iPhone Xs
Review.Contenu: I ordered a new battery for my iPhone Xs, along with a seal and some small tools (for the guitar picks and suction cup).  It all went well, but I couldn't recommend anyone order it with the tools as it did not even come with all the required screwdrivers, and I'm thankful I had my own set.  The waterproof seal was perfect and looked just like the original.  Overall, four stars, if it weren't for the disappointing tool kit.

Review.Titre: Quality consistency
Review.Contenu: Im a teenager that’s been fixing screens since middle school. I use to buy screens from Amazon and it’s was cool at first but their screens aren’t consistent and with Irepair I know I’m getting a quality screen every time. Great work.

Review.Titre: Great Lead Time. Review Suggestions
Review.Contenu: The company is great about getting items delivered on time, if not early. Review.Titre: Great company. Products not 100% working
Review.Contenu: The company did well at providing products not a lot of places do, and cheaper than those that do. Great shipping speed. Arrived on time as stated.Now with every review comes some bad. The lcd replacement screen I ordered for my iPhone 12 Pro Max has some issues. The screen itself has 2 marks on it when powered on. You can’t tell unless you look at an angle or are scrolling on the phone when powered on. The touchscreen doesn’t work 100% of them time, I have to touch it multiple times for it to register. Usually right where the back button is on almost everything for the iPhone. No where on the repairpartsusa.com webpage for iPhone 12 Pro Max replacement lcd screen did it state that after installing this screen the iPhone would display a message saying the iPhone screen is either not genuine or not completely installed. This message you can not remove (unless taking parts from old screen and replacing them, but what’s the point this is supposed to be plug and play) The company itself is great which is why it gets 4 stars from me. Out of thousands of products sold there is bound to be a bad one or two. So nothing taken from that. I have however marked a star off for not being transparent. Any Company should list any issues or incompatibilities for a product they are selling as a replacement. I will be starting a return on the screen, depending how that goes may affect the score I have given today.

I can't answer the question to transfer my pictures. Review.Titre: Notification - Quality
Review.Contenu: I like being Notified of my purchase with digital invoice, with shipping status provided daily via email that is accurate to hour of my delivery by USPS-who does that-Repair Parts USA.  Quality of part received from Repair Parts USA was "superior" having purchased a manufacturers "same part number" part from another vendor a week prior to this purchase that failed to meet any claim that vendor provided. That battery was fully discharged upon delivery and was very warm while charging, took over 19 hours to fully charge, and was 70% discharged overnight without use, most notable, the battery was oversized by 1/8 inch not allowing proper seal of my phone cover, it's label had minimal data and stated made in China. The Repair Parts USA battery was exactly as stated-a new fully functional battery that was 67% charged upon delivery, and fully charged in 4 hours maybe less, I used it after charging, the next day-it shows a 92% charge after sitting non-tethered over night.  I am also confident in the battery labeling, it is the same as my Samsung OEM battery made in Japan, and yes it says "made in Japan".  I have high confidence in Repair Parts USA and I highly recommend.
